title: Matteo Jorgenson Soloes to Dwars Win, Wout van Aert to Miss Flanders, Roubaix after High-Speed Crash
content:
Dwars door Vlaanderen: American powers to victory and Visma-Lease a Bike confirms Van Aert will miss Flanders, Roubaix, and Amstel Gold.

Read the full article at Matteo Jorgenson Soloes to Dwars Win, Wout van Aert to Miss Flanders, Roubaix after High-Speed Crash on Velo.
author: ahood
